li.label: Phantom Blow
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} strikes with the silence of mist, evading detection until the last moment. {PAWN_pronoun}’s attacks land with precision, cutting through defenses like a shadow passing unnoticed.

li.label: Shifting Mirage
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with an elusive grace, like mist dissipating on the wind. {PAWN_pronoun} strikes quickly and disappears into the fog, leaving foes unable to react or track {PAWN_pronoun} movements.

li.label: Elusive Control
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} seems to vanish into thin air, evoking the mysterious presence of mist. {PAWN_pronoun} manipulates {PAWN_possessive} surroundings with deceptive cunning, guiding both beasts and allies through the unseen air.

li.label: Fading Resolve
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} stands like a mist, resilient against all odds. Even when the world around {PAWN_pronoun} fades and the darkness threatens to consume, {PAWN_pronoun} remains—silent, subtle, and unwavering.

li.label: Illusive Guard
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves through the battlefield like mist through the trees, impossible to pin down. {PAWN_pronoun}’s presence is elusive, slipping through harm, never fully caught in one place.

li.label: Phantom Flavors
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} uses the ethereal nature of mist to craft subtle, but unforgettable meals. {PAWN_pronoun}’s culinary skills blend ingredients with the lightness of mist, creating flavors that linger in the mind, elusive and mysterious.

li.label: Enigmatic Presence
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} emits an aura of mystery, like a mist that wraps the world in its obscurity. {PAWN_pronoun}’s presence is felt, but never fully understood, igniting curiosity and devotion in those around {PAWN_pronoun}.

li.label: Phantom Healer
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} heals with the gentleness of mist, restoring the spirit and body with a light touch. {PAWN_pronoun}’s healing powers are subtle, barely noticeable yet profound, like mist that quietly nurtures life back into existence.

li.label: Ephemeral Harvest
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} nurtures the land with the fleeting grace of mist, aiding in the rapid growth of plants and crops. Wherever {PAWN_pronoun} walks, new life sprouts as if summoned by the passing fog.
